channel.title: [Delta]Why is the client taking so long to login?
channel.description:
Well i think this is a universal error since just recently a pi server that I was playing had the same pro and they couldn't fix it. Here is how the problem goes. [i][b][size=18pt]If the server is online then you start the client and try to login the client will freeze and not log you in...but theres a way around it. Load the client and then try to login. The client will then freeze, but after a few seconds you will get a error in connecting to the server. Then you will run your server and you will be able to login.[/size][/b][/i]
Can someone tell me whats up with this? I'm so confused on why my client freezes when login. Its not even being hosted online. Thanks for your help

item.title: [Delta]Why is the client taking so long to login?
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

Well i think this is a universal error since just recently a pi server that I was playing had the same pro and they couldn’t fix it. Here is how the problem goes.
[size=18pt]If the server is online then you start the client and try to login the client will freeze and not log you in…but theres a way around it. Load the client and then try to login. The client will then freeze, but after a few seconds you will get a error in connecting to the server. Then you will run your server and you will be able to login.[/size]

Can someone tell me whats up with this? I’m so confused on why my client freezes when login. Its not even being hosted online.
Thanks for your help
